subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: After quarreling with Coach Jim Boeheim and battling a weight problem last season, Dion Waiters is now the Orange’s most explosive player and a projected top 20 N.B.A. draft pick.
snippet: After quarreling with Coach Jim Boeheim and battling a weight problem last season, Dion Waiters is now the Orange’s most explosive player and a projected top 20 N.B.A. draft pick.
